reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act   Loi sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. For the purposes of subsection 159 (4) of the Act (rate of tax), the following percentages are prescribed for the years indicated: 1. For 1998, 5 per cent. 2. For 1999, 4 per cent. 3. For 2000, 3 per cent. 4. For 2001, 2 per cent. 5. For 2002, 1 per cent. 6. For 2003 and subsequent years, 0 per cent. O. Reg. 294/00, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of subsection 159 (4) of the Act (rate of tax), the following percentages are prescribed for the years indicated:

1. For 1998, 5 per cent.

2. For 1999, 4 per cent.

3. For 2000, 3 per cent.

4. For 2001, 2 per cent.

5. For 2002, 1 per cent.

6. For 2003 and subsequent years, 0 per cent. O. Reg. 294/00, s. 1.
2. Revoked: O. Reg. 294/00, s. 1.
